nodes.text: Perri-Teeka was a male statesman from the planet Naboo. By the time of the Battle of Naboo in the year 32 BBY, he was considered legendary in status, and a building known as the Hall of Perri-Teeka stood as a monument to him in Naboo's capital city of Theed.

Perri-Teeka was first mentioned in canon in the 2016 reference book Star Wars: Complete Locations. The character originated from the Star Wars Legends reference book Inside the Worlds of Star Wars: Episode I, which was written by Kristin Lund and released in 2000.
